betterleads.menu.title: BetterLeads
betterleads.merchants.tooltip: Whether merchants (villagers and traders) can be leashed.
betterleads.hostiles.tooltip: Whether hostile mobs can be leashed.
betterleads.watercreatures.tooltip: Whether water creatures (fish and squid) can be leashed.
betterleads.ambients.tooltip: Whether ambient mobs (bats) can be leashed.
betterleads.chain.tooltip: Whether leashes can be chained between entities.
